import React from "react"; import styled from "styled-components"; import { NavLink as RouterNavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import Helmet from 'react-helmet'; import { CardContent, Grid, Link, Breadcrumbs as MuiBreadcrumbs, Button as MuiButton, Card as MuiCard, Divider as MuiDivider, Fab as MuiFab, IconButton as MuiIconButton, Typography } from "@material-ui/core"; import { Add as AddIcon, Edit as EditIcon, Delete as DeleteIcon, CloudUpload as CloudUploadIcon, KeyboardVoice as KeyboardVoiceIcon, Navigation as NavigationIcon, Save as SaveIcon } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { spacing } from "@material-ui/system"; const NavLink = React.forwardRef((props, ref) => ( )); const Card = styled(MuiCard)(spacing); const Button = styled(MuiButton)(spacing); const Fab = styled(MuiFab)(spacing); const IconButton = styled(MuiIconButton)(spacing); const Divider = styled(MuiDivider)(spacing); const Breadcrumbs = styled(MuiBreadcrumbs)(spacing); function ContainedButtons() { return ( Contained Buttons Contained buttons are high-emphasis, distinguished by their use of elevation and fill. ); } function TextButtons() { return ( Text Buttons Text buttons are typically used for less-pronounced actions in your app. ); } function OutlinedButtons() { return ( Outlined Buttons Outlined buttons are medium-emphasis buttons which contain actions that are not that important. ); } function FloatingActionButtons() { return ( Floating Action Buttons A floating action button (FAB) performs the primary, or most common, action on a screen. Extended ); } function ButtonSizes() { return ( Button Sizes Fancy larger or smaller buttons? Use the size property.
); } function IconButtons() { return ( Icon Buttons Sometimes you might want to have icons for certain button to enhance the UX. ); } function Buttons() { return ( Buttons Dashboard Components Buttons ); } export default Buttons;
